StartBrandNewGameController - Class in com.risk.controller.game
This class is similar to all other controllers in the project, the StartBrandNewGameController also takes care of the movement of data into the model corresponding to the view and the controller and also takes care of updating the view whenever a change is detected.
StartBrandNewGameController(Environment) - Constructor for class com.risk.controller.game.StartBrandNewGameController
This constructor initializes values to be used in for view object and the parameters to be passed on to the view classes.
